rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Chickens at three other properties within the 5km restricted zone or broader 15km control area surrounding the site of the first outbreak were identified as having H7N3 last week.

rationale: The segment states facts neutrally, without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
